long_description: The Yurbuds Inspire Ironman Series earphones will help take your athletic experience to the next level with a secure, comfortable fit. They were designed by an engineer training for his first Ironman. Patented twist-lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keeps them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs flexible silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Durable, sweatproof and water-resistant earphones deliver reliable performance in almost any conditions. Angled plug relieves strain on the wire. The Yurbuds Inspire Ironman Series earphones are compatible with your iPod(R), iPad(R) and iPhone(R), and come with a zippered soft case.
short_description: The Yurbuds Inspire Ironman Series earphones will help take your athletic experience to the next level with a secure, comfortable fit. They were designed by an engineer training for his first Ironman.
